title: Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption
author: Stephen King
description: The Great Gatsby is a novel by American author F. Scott Fitzgerald. The story takes place in 1922, during the Roaring Twenties, a time of prosperity in the United States after World War I. The book received mixed reviews from literary critics, but it has since become a classic of modern American literature.
